title: Task Analysis: Extract Bank Statement to Excel
content: The user wants me to read a PDF document, extract the bank statement information, and create an Excel file from it. I will need to use the document_specialist to read the PDF, then parse the text to identify the bank statement details. After that, I'll use the spreadsheet_specialist to create the Excel file. I should start by using the document_specialist to read the document and extract the text.
summary: Analysis of the user request to extract bank statement data from a PDF and create an Excel file.
